txt.en: Talk to Sadrech at her camp
'I shall rest easier now. Many thanks, [placeholder].'

The woman grimaces at your approach.

'Apologies. My injuries -- they are minor, but not at all painless. I didn't notice the Corsairs until it was too late.

'You are a [placeholder], are you not? My daughter and I wish to return to Melgobas, but with Corsairs brazenly roaming so close to the road, I do not like our chances.

'Their encampment lies to the north-east. If you can cause trouble and defeat some of them, I'd feel better about those chances.'
You have defeated enough Corsairs.\n\nYou should let Sadrech know at her camp.
Sadrech has asked you to defeat Corsairs at Bel Tâkhmar.\n\nThe encampment can be found north-east of her camp.
The Corsairs' presence in Anfalas weighs heavily on Sadrech's mind.
